## WebMapMain.create() method

Manual way to create a map (If [MapOptions.create](./webmap.mapoptions.create.md) is `false`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
create(): Promise<this>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;this&gt;

## Example


```javascript
const webMap = new WebMap(options);
webMap.create().then(() => doSomething());
```
